summary:
NearDark is Devil\'s Sword. (3 Weapon add it)
It\'s 2Hand Sword but Attacking is Very Fast.
Weapon has most option and Qunique impact.
descriptionHtml:
Date : 2013/ 02/ 02
Make : Kpmy84@naver.com / Nexus : dhodhodidi (OhongYe)



[= This Mod is my custom Devil\'s 2HandSword Mod =]
[= You can cool Play, impact feel is buster =]



=== NearDark is Devil\'s Sword. (3 Weapon add it) ===
=== It\'s 2Hand Sword but Attacking is Very Fast. ===
=== Weapon has most option and Unique impact. ===


- Custom Data Depth, Heighest, Textures, Sounding is All make it.
- And all in the mod item\'s are evething new Files.
- So, This Mod is don\'t Crashing your Mods. 



[= Now you can play =]
- It Weapon\'s Location is Riverwood main entrance campfire(Key & Treasure Box)



***** And, if you use my asset, it\'s can.
***** but, you must Credit for my link.

[=  UPDATE LOG  =]
Ver1.1 Effect Patch - It Change for Near Dark Effect (Defult - Ball Type => New - Slasher OggType)
Ver1.1 ESP Patch - Mod more add Not Fear Version (More 3 Weapon) 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

7z compressed files decompression

then,
 
Overwritten, in Data Folder


[= Credit =]
Bethesda for releasing Skyrim.
